title: [Snyk] SNYK-PYTHON-H11-10293728 in h11@0.14.0
description:
## HTTP Request Smuggling

**Severity:** critical
**Package:** h11@0.14.0
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/requirements.txt`

**CVSS Score:** 9.3  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 679/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2025-43859](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-43859)

**Fix:** Pin `h11` to version 0.16.0 or later.

### Details
## Overview
[h11](https://pypi.org/project/h11) is an A pure-Python, bring-your-own-I/O implementation of HTTP/1.1

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to HTTP Request Smuggling via the class `ChunkedReader` in `_readers.py` file, which performs the parsing of line terminators in chunked-coding message bodies. An attacker can exploit this to bypass security controls and smuggle HTTP requests by crafting malformed chunked-encoding bodies.
## Remediation
Upgrade `h11` to version 0.16.0 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/python-hyper/h11/commit/dff7cc397a26ed4acdedd92d1bda6c8f18a6ed9f)


### Reference
- [Snyk advisory](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-H11-10293728)
